name: Becoming Terrestrial
description:
Play as 4 different species as you evolve your way to land!

Credits:

  • Programming & Level Design - Bread & BgAlex
  • Tilesets & Particles - Rifuzas
  • Sprites & Animation - Niko (Drop Table)
  • Music & SFX - Curro (Drop Table) & Physi
  • Story & Cutscenes - Keaton
  • Game Design - All listed parties

If you are struggling, you can skip levels through the pause menu.

A controller is recommended, but the game is fully playable with both keyboards and controllers.

All controls are rebindable; default controls are:

  • Move - WASD/Arrow Keys/Controller Left Stick
  • Jump - Space/Bottom Controller Button/Right Controller Button
  • Action - J/Left Controller Button/Top Controller Button
  • Pause - Esc/Start/Select

If you have a hard time getting your controller to work on the web build, consider downloading a build for your operating system.

Having a controller connected may cause keyboard controls to not work as intended.

Known Issues:

  • Game does not work on Firefox due  to a lack of support for SharedArrayBuffer. If you use Firefox, we suggest playing this game on Chrome, or downloading a build for your operating system.
  • Controller face buttons are all mixed up for some controllers on the web build. If this is affects you, downloading a build for your operating system is suggested.
